button.uploadDocuments.description: Button text that allows users to upload documents

field.fileName.description: The name of the uploaded document

field.createdAt.description: The time the document was uploaded

field.fileExtension.description: The file type of the uploaded document

field.fileUrl.description: The link to the uploaded document

field.fileSize.description: The size of the uploaded document

field.state.description: The processing status of the document

field.stateCompleted.description: The document has been processed successfully

message.introductionForKnowledge.message: Documents can be added to the knowledge base, which can be used by the bot when responding.
message.introductionForKnowledge.description: Introduction information for the knowledge base

message.introductionForRepository.message: The knowledge base is a collection of documents where you can add documents. The bot will respond from the documents in the knowledge base.
message.introductionForRepository.description: Introduction information for the knowledge base

message.uploadDocumentsExceed.description: Error message when the number of uploaded documents exceeds the limit

message.uploadDocumentsError.description: Error message when document upload fails

message.uploadDocumentsSuccess.description: Success message when document upload succeeds

message.createDocumentSuccess.description: Success message when document creation succeeds

message.createDocumentError.description: Error message when document processing fails

message.dragOrClickToUpload.message: Drag or click to upload documents
message.dragOrClickToUpload.description: Information about dragging or clicking to upload documents

message.startNewChat.description: Information for starting a new conversation

message.errorApiError.message: Response failed, please try again later
message.errorApiError.description: Error message when the response fails

message.errorBadRequest.message: Request content format is incorrect, please ask again
message.errorBadRequest.description: Error message when the request content format is incorrect

message.errorNoConversation.message: Conversation does not exist or has expired, please start a new conversation
message.errorNoConversation.description: Error message when the conversation does not exist or has expired

message.errorContentTooLarge.message: Question content is too long, please shorten it and try again
message.errorContentTooLarge.description: Error message when the question content is too long

message.errorTooManyRequests.message: Your actions are too frequent, please try again later
message.errorTooManyRequests.description: Error message when actions are too frequent

message.errorUsedUp.message: You have reached the usage limit of your plan, please purchase more usage to continue
message.errorUsedUp.description: Error message when the usage limit of the plan is reached

message.errorUnknown.message: An unknown server error occurred, please try again later or contact customer service
message.errorUnknown.description: Error message when an unknown server error occurs

message.errorTimeout.message: Response to the question timed out, please try again later
message.errorTimeout.description: Error message when responding to a question times out

message.errorNotApplied.message: You have not applied for this service, please apply before proceeding with the question
message.errorNotApplied.description: Error message when the user has not applied for this service

message.howToUse.message: Press Shift+Enter for a new line
message.howToUse.description: Information on how to create a new line

message.createRepositorySuccess.description: Success message when the knowledge base is created successfully

message.createRepositoryFailed.description: Error message when the knowledge base creation fails

message.deleteRepositorySuccess.description: Success message when the knowledge base is deleted successfully

message.deleteDocumentSuccess.description: Success message when the document is deleted successfully

message.currentRepository.description: Information displaying the current knowledge base

message.nameRequired.description: Error message when the name is empty

message.inputRepositoryName.description: Placeholder for inputting the knowledge base name

message.inputRepositoryDescription.message: Describe your knowledge base in one sentence
message.inputRepositoryDescription.description: Input placeholder for the knowledge base description

message.supportedFiles.description: Information showing the supported file types
